languages.text: "Без обид, Найдж, но если ты найдешь в отсеке хотя бы трех человек, способных дать доклад и обойтись при этом без бранных словечек, я признаю, что был неправ". {n}Монтэг с улыбкой взирает на умолкшего Найджа.{/n} "Вы — хорошие ребята, и мне бы не хотелось, чтобы вы оскорбили {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость какой-нибудь глупостью и даже не поняли этого".

"No offence, Nije, but if you can find even three people in this bay who can give a report without turning the air blue, I'll gladly admit I was wrong." {n}Einrich grins at the now silent Nije.{/n} "You're a good bunch, I'd hate to see you insult {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with some foolishness and not even realise it."
languages.original_text: "Без обид, Найдж, но если ты найдешь в отсеке хотя бы трех человек, способных дать доклад и обойтись при этом без бранных словечек, я признаю, что был неправ". {n}Монтэг с улыбкой взирает на умолкшего Найджа.{/n} "Вы — хорошие ребята, и мне бы не хотелось, чтобы вы оскорбили {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость какой-нибудь глупостью и даже не поняли этого".

"No offence, Nije, but if you can find even three people in this bay who can give a report without turning the air blue, I'll gladly admit I was wrong." {n}Einrich grins at the now silent Nije.{/n} "You're a good bunch, I'd hate to see you insult {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with some foolishness and not even realise it."

languages.text: «No se ofenda, Nije, pero si me encuentra a tres personas en todo el compartimento que sean capaces de presentar un informe sin que el aire se vuelva azul, estaré encantado de admitir que me equivoco». {n}Einrich sonríe al enmudecido Nije.{/n} «Son ustedes buena gente, no quisiera que ofendiesen {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán sin darse cuenta».
languages.original_text: "No offence, Nije, but if you can find even three people in this bay who can give a report without turning the air blue, I'll gladly admit I was wrong." {n}Einrich grins at the now silent Nije.{/n} "You're a good bunch, I'd hate to see you insult {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with some foolishness and not even realise it."

traits.locale_text: «No se ofenda, Nije, pero si me encuentra a tres personas en todo el compartimento que sean capaces de presentar un informe sin que el aire se vuelva azul, estaré encantado de admitir que me equivoco». {n}Einrich sonríe al enmudecido Nije.{/n} «Son ustedes buena gente, no quisiera que ofendiesen {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán sin darse cuenta».

languages.text: 「悪気はないんだ、ニジェ。でも、この湾で空気を青くせずに報告できる人間が3人見つけられるのなら、私は喜んで自分の間違いを認めるよ」{n}アインリッヒは無言のニジェに向かってニヤリと笑った。{/n}「あなた方はいい人たちです。愚かな行為で気が付かないうちに陛下を侮辱するのを見たくありません」
languages.original_text: "No offence, Nije, but if you can find even three people in this bay who can give a report without turning the air blue, I'll gladly admit I was wrong." {n}Einrich grins at the now silent Nije.{/n} "You're a good bunch, I'd hate to see you insult {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with some foolishness and not even realise it."

traits.locale_text: 「悪気はないんだ、ニジェ。でも、この湾で空気を青くせずに報告できる人間が3人見つけられるのなら、私は喜んで自分の間違いを認めるよ」{n}アインリッヒは無言のニジェに向かってニヤリと笑った。{/n}「あなた方はいい人たちです。愚かな行為で気が付かないうちに陛下を侮辱するのを見たくありません」

languages.text: “我无意冒犯，尼杰。不过，只要你能在这片甲板上找到三个人，能在不口吐污言秽语的情况下进行报告，我都愿意承认是我说错话了。”{n}艾因里奇对着陷入沉默的尼杰咧嘴一笑。{/n}“你们都是些好家伙，我可不希望你们在意识不到的情况下说出蠢话，脏了舰长大人的耳朵。”
languages.original_text: "No offence, Nije, but if you can find even three people in this bay who can give a report without turning the air blue, I'll gladly admit I was wrong." {n}Einrich grins at the now silent Nije.{/n} "You're a good bunch, I'd hate to see you insult {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with some foolishness and not even realise it."

traits.locale_text: “我无意冒犯，尼杰。不过，只要你能在这片甲板上找到三个人，能在不口吐污言秽语的情况下进行报告，我都愿意承认是我说错话了。”{n}艾因里奇对着陷入沉默的尼杰咧嘴一笑。{/n}“你们都是些好家伙，我可不希望你们在意识不到的情况下说出蠢话，脏了舰长大人的耳朵。”

languages.text: "Nichts für ungut, Nije, aber wenn Ihr in dieser Bucht auch nur drei Leute findet, die Bericht erstatten können, ohne die Luft blau zu färben, gebe ich gerne zu, dass ich mich geirrt habe." {n}Einrich grinst den verstummten Nije an.{/n} "Ihr seid ein guter Mann und ich sähe es ungern, dass Ihr {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} mit irgendeiner Dummheit beleidigt und es nicht einmal bemerkt."
languages.original_text: "No offence, Nije, but if you can find even three people in this bay who can give a report without turning the air blue, I'll gladly admit I was wrong." {n}Einrich grins at the now silent Nije.{/n} "You're a good bunch, I'd hate to see you insult {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with some foolishness and not even realise it."

traits.locale_text: "Nichts für ungut, Nije, aber wenn Ihr in dieser Bucht auch nur drei Leute findet, die Bericht erstatten können, ohne die Luft blau zu färben, gebe ich gerne zu, dass ich mich geirrt habe." {n}Einrich grinst den verstummten Nije an.{/n} "Ihr seid ein guter Mann und ich sähe es ungern, dass Ihr {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} mit irgendeiner Dummheit beleidigt und es nicht einmal bemerkt."

languages.text: « Ne le prenez pas mal, Nije, mais je doute qu'il se trouve ici plus de trois personnes capables de faire leur rapport sans jurer comme des charretiers. Dans le cas contraire, j'admettrai volontiers mes torts. » {n}Einrich adresse un sourire plein d'insolence à Nije, qui semble bien incapable de rétorquer quoi que ce soit.{/n} « Vous n'êtes pas bien méchants, mais ce serait dommage que vous insultiez Sa Seigneurie sans même vous en rendre compte. »
languages.original_text: "No offence, Nije, but if you can find even three people in this bay who can give a report without turning the air blue, I'll gladly admit I was wrong." {n}Einrich grins at the now silent Nije.{/n} "You're a good bunch, I'd hate to see you insult {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with some foolishness and not even realise it."

traits.locale_text: « Ne le prenez pas mal, Nije, mais je doute qu'il se trouve ici plus de trois personnes capables de faire leur rapport sans jurer comme des charretiers. Dans le cas contraire, j'admettrai volontiers mes torts. » {n}Einrich adresse un sourire plein d'insolence à Nije, qui semble bien incapable de rétorquer quoi que ce soit.{/n} « Vous n'êtes pas bien méchants, mais ce serait dommage que vous insultiez Sa Seigneurie sans même vous en rendre compte. »

languages.text: "Yanlış anlama Nije ama bu bölmede sövüp saymadan rapor verebilen üç kişi bile bulabilirsen memnuniyetle hatalı olduğumu itiraf ederim." {n}Einrich, sesi kesilen Nije'ye doğru sırıtıyor.{/n} "Siz iyi bir güruhsunuz. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni ahmaklık yaparak farkına bile varmadan aşağıladığınızı görmek beni üzer."
languages.original_text: "No offence, Nije, but if you can find even three people in this bay who can give a report without turning the air blue, I'll gladly admit I was wrong." {n}Einrich grins at the now silent Nije.{/n} "You're a good bunch, I'd hate to see you insult {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} with some foolishness and not even realise it."
